zh-cn: 柴静雾霾调查：穹顶之下 同呼吸 共命运

description.zh-cn: 由媒体人柴静于2015年2月底推出的关于中国空气污染的一部调查纪录片，最初在官方媒体平台播出，但很快遭到中共中央宣传部全面封杀。
description.en: An investigative documentary about air pollution in China released by journalist Chai Jing in late February 2015. It was initially broadcast on official media platforms but was soon completely banned by the Propaganda Department of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国媒体人、记者，纪录片《穹顶之下》的制作人、主讲人及编剧。
description.en: Chinese media personality and journalist, who was the producer, presenter, and writer of the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 指空气中含有对人类或其他物种造成伤害或不适的化学物质、悬浮粒子或生物分子的状态，是纪录片《穹顶之下》探讨的核心议题。
description.en: The presence of chemicals, particulate matter, or biological molecules in the air that cause harm or discomfort to humans or other living organisms. It is the central issue explored in the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 纪录片《穹顶之下》所关注的空气污染问题发生的国家。
description.en: The country where the air pollution problem, as focused on by the documentary 'Under the Dome', occurs.

en: Propaganda Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的宣传机构，下令全面封杀纪录片《穹顶之下》。
description.en: The propaganda agency of the Communist Party of China, which ordered a complete ban on the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 中国官方媒体网站，是《穹顶之下》的首发平台之一，后应中宣部要求将影片撤下。
description.en: An official Chinese state media website, one of the initial platforms to release 'Under the Dome', which later removed the film at the request of the Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国视频网站，是《穹顶之下》的首发平台之一，后应中宣部要求将影片撤下。
description.en: A Chinese video website, one of the initial platforms to release 'Under the Dome', which later removed the film at the request of the Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长，在《穹顶之下》发布后曾发短信向柴静表示赞赏。
description.en: Then-Minister of Environmental Protection of the People's Republic of China, who sent a text message to Chai Jing expressing appreciation after the release of 'Under the Dome'.

en: Ministry of Environmental Protection of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 负责中国环境保护事务的政府部门。
description.en: The government department responsible for environmental protection affairs in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有石油企业，在纪录片《穹顶之下》中被点名批评，其后股价下跌。
description.en: A major Chinese state-owned oil and gas corporation, which was criticized by name in the documentary 'Under the Dome', and its stock price subsequently fell.

nodes.id: 中国石油化工集团公司

zh-cn: 中国石油化工集团公司

description.zh-cn: 中国大型国有石油企业，在纪录片《穹顶之下》中被点名批评，其后股价下跌。
description.en: A major Chinese state-owned oil and gas corporation, which was criticized by name in the documentary 'Under the Dome', and its stock price subsequently fell.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国务院总理。在记者会上被问及《穹顶之下》时，其回答中有关该片的内容在官方媒体的实录中被删除。
description.en: Then-Premier of the State Council of China. When asked about 'Under the Dome' at a press conference, the portion of his response related to the film was deleted from the official media transcript.

en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 上海的一家财经报纸，其一名员工因泄露中宣部封杀《穹顶之下》的指令而遭停职。
description.en: A Shanghai-based financial newspaper, an employee of which was suspended for leaking the Propaganda Department's directive to ban 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 科普作家，曾撰文指称《穹顶之下》中的故事为编造。
description.en: A popular science writer who wrote an article alleging that stories in 'Under the Dome' were fabricated.

description.zh-cn: 中国石油天然气集团公司的质量与标准管理部副总工程师，曾撰文对《穹顶之下》提出批评。
description.en: Deputy Chief Engineer of the Quality and Standards Management Department of China National Petroleum Corporation, who wrote an article criticizing 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 由美国前副总统艾尔·高尔主讲的关于气候变化的纪录片，《穹顶之下》的呈现方式与其类似。
description.en: A documentary film about climate change presented by former U.S. Vice President Al Gore, whose presentation style is similar to that of 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家和环保活动家，纪录片《难以忽视的真相》的主讲人。
description.en: American politician and environmentalist, presenter of the documentary 'An Inconvenient Truth'.

description.zh-cn: 中国官方媒体网站，在《穹顶之下》发布后曾刊文讨论，后应中宣部要求撤下影片及相关文章。
description.en: An official Chinese state media website, which published articles discussing 'Under the Dome' after its release but later removed the film and related articles at the request of the Propaganda Department.

description.zh-cn: 指中华人民共和国全国人民代表大会和中国人民政治协商会议的年度全体会议。《穹顶之下》在2015年两会前夕发布，引发了与会代表和委员的热议。
description.en: Refers to the annual plenary sessions of the National People's Congress (NPC) and the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC) of the PRC. 'Under the Dome' was released on the eve of the 2015 Two Sessions, sparking heated discussions among delegates and members.

en: All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce

description.zh-cn: 中国工商界组成的人民团体和商会组织。其下属环境商会的秘书长高度评价了《穹顶之下》的意义。
description.en: A people's organization and chamber of commerce composed of individuals from China's industrial and commercial circles. The secretary-general of its environmental chamber highly praised the significance of 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 由雷切尔·卡森撰写的关于环境问题的书籍，其影响力被用来与《穹顶之下》相比较。
description.en: A book on environmental issues written by Rachel Carson, whose impact has been compared to that of 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 美国海洋生物学家和作家，著有《寂静的春天》。
description.en: American marine biologist and author of 'Silent Spring'.

description.zh-cn: 时任山西省环境保护厅厅长，曾在纪录片《穹顶之下》中出镜，后因涉嫌严重违纪违法被调查。
description.en: Then-Director of the Shanxi Provincial Department of Environmental Protection, who appeared in the documentary 'Under the Dome' and was later investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law.

en: Shanxi Provincial Department of Environmental Protection

description.zh-cn: 中国山西省负责环境保护事务的政府部门。
description.en: The government department responsible for environmental protection affairs in Shanxi Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 柴静自费制作并主持了纪录片《穹顶之下》，以唤起公众对中国空气污染问题的关注。
description.en: Chai Jing self-funded, produced, and presented the documentary 'Under the Dome' to raise public awareness of China's air pollution problem.

description.zh-cn: 《穹顶之下》通过调查和演讲，呼吁公众关注中国的空气污染问题，极大地推动了该议题在社会上的讨论热度。
description.en: 'Under the Dome', through investigation and presentation, called for public attention to China's air pollution problem, significantly boosting the intensity of public discussion on the issue.

description.zh-cn: 纪录片聚焦并深入探讨了中国的空气污染现状、成因及治理困境，引发了全国性的社会反响和政策讨论。
description.en: The documentary focused on and delved into the state, causes, and governance challenges of air pollution in China, triggering a nationwide social response and policy debate.

description.zh-cn: 《穹顶之下》的呈现方式，包括演讲、数据可视化和外拍片段，被认为与《难以忽视的真相》十分类似。
description.en: The presentation style of 'Under the Dome', including its use of a lecture format, data visualization, and field footage, was considered very similar to that of 'An Inconvenient Truth'.

description.zh-cn: 艾尔·高尔是2006年纪录片《难以忽视的真相》的主讲人，该片旨在提高全球对气候变化的认识。
description.en: Al Gore was the presenter of the 2006 documentary 'An Inconvenient Truth', which aimed to raise global awareness of climate change.

description.zh-cn: 人民网是《穹顶之下》的联合首发平台之一，并在影片发布同日刊登了对柴静的专访。
description.en: People's Daily Online was one of the co-premiere platforms for 'Under the Dome' and published an exclusive interview with Chai Jing on the same day of the film's release.

description.zh-cn: 优酷网是《穹顶之下》的联合首发平台之一，为影片的早期传播提供了重要渠道。
description.en: Youku was one of the co-premiere platforms for 'Under the Dome', providing a key channel for the film's early dissemination.

description.zh-cn: 时任环保部长陈吉宁在影片发布后，通过短信和公开场合对《穹顶之下》及其作者柴静表示了感谢和赞赏，认为其唤起了公众对环境问题的重视。
description.en: Then-Minister of Environmental Protection Chen Jining, after the film's release, expressed his gratitude and appreciation for 'Under the Dome' and its creator Chai Jing via text message and in public, stating that it had awakened public concern for environmental issues.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央宣传部于2015年3月2日左右下达指示，要求媒体停止报道《穹顶之下》，并最终导致该片在中国大陆互联网上被全面封杀。
description.en: Around March 2, 2015, the Propaganda Department of the CCP Central Committee issued a directive requiring media to stop reporting on 'Under the Dome', which ultimately led to the film being completely banned on the Chinese internet.

description.zh-cn: 根据中宣部的指示，人民网撤下了《穹顶之下》的视频及其相关文章。
description.en: Following the directive from the Propaganda Department, People's Daily Online removed the video of 'Under the Dome' and its related articles.

description.zh-cn: 根据中宣部的指示，新华网撤下了《穹顶之下》的视频及其相关文章。
description.en: Following the directive from the Propaganda Department, Xinhuanet removed the video of 'Under the Dome' and its related articles.

description.zh-cn: 因一名员工泄露了中宣部关于封杀《穹顶之下》的机密通告，《第一财经日报》该员工遭到停职处理。
description.en: An employee of China Business News was suspended after leaking a confidential notice from the Propaganda Department regarding the ban on 'Under the Dome'.

relationships.target: 中国石油天然气集团公司

description.zh-cn: 《穹顶之下》在视频中点名批评了中石油，影片发布后的第一个交易日，其股价下跌。
description.en: 'Under the Dome' criticized CNPC by name in the video. On the first trading day after the film's release, its stock price fell.

relationships.target: 中国石油化工集团公司

description.zh-cn: 《穹顶之下》在视频中点名批评了中石化，影片发布后的第一个交易日，其股价下跌。
description.en: 'Under the Dome' criticized Sinopec by name in the video. On the first trading day after the film's release, its stock price fell.

description.zh-cn: 在2015年3月15日的记者会上，时任总理李克强被问及《穹顶之下》，但在官方媒体发布的问答实录中，有关该纪录片的内容被删除。
description.en: At a press conference on March 15, 2015, then-Premier Li Keqiang was asked about 'Under the Dome', but in the official media transcript of the Q&A, content related to the documentary was deleted.

description.zh-cn: 作为中石油高层，万战翔撰写文章针对《穹顶之下》提出了五点批评，以反驳影片中的观点。
description.en: As a senior executive at CNPC, Wan Zhanxiang wrote an article presenting five points of criticism against 'Under the Dome' to refute the views expressed in the film.

description.zh-cn: 方舟子撰文质疑《穹顶之下》开篇讲述的柴静女儿患肿瘤的故事是编造的，从而对其可信度提出批评。
description.en: Fang Zhouzi wrote an article questioning the credibility of 'Under the Dome' by alleging that the opening story about Chai Jing's daughter having a tumor was fabricated.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国环境保护部

description.zh-cn: 陈吉宁于2015年2月至2017年5月期间担任中华人民共和国环境保护部部长。
description.en: Chen Jining served as the Minister of Environmental Protection of the People's Republic of China from February 2015 to May 2017.

description.zh-cn: 李克强自2013年3月15日起担任中国国务院总理。
description.en: Li Keqiang has served as the Premier of the State Council of China since March 15, 2013.

position.en: Deputy Chief Engineer of the Quality and Standards Management Department

description.zh-cn: 万战翔是中国石油天然气集团公司的质量与标准管理部副总工程师。
description.en: Wan Zhanxiang is the Deputy Chief Engineer of the Quality and Standards Management Department at China National Petroleum Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 刘向东在《穹顶之下》影片中出镜时，担任山西省环境保护厅厅长。
description.en: Liu Xiangdong was the Director of the Shanxi Provincial Department of Environmental Protection at the time of his appearance in the documentary 'Under the Dome'.

description.zh-cn: 雷切尔·卡森是《寂静的春天》一书的作者，该书被认为是现代环保运动的开端。
description.en: Rachel Carson is the author of the book 'Silent Spring', which is considered to have launched the modern environmental movement.
